translations: v.打扰，纠缠；争辩（hassle 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Then my husband started hassling me.
sentences.translation: 然后我丈夫便开始不停地烦我。

sentences.sentence: Don't keep hassling me! I'll do it later.
sentences.translation: 别老烦我！我稍后会做的。

sentences.sentence: I wish you would stop hassling me (about stopping smoking).
sentences.translation: 我希望你别再烦扰我(有关戒烟的事)。
